// NOTE: Copy this file to 'local.json' and update with your actual values
// NOTE2: The 'local.json' file is gitignored and won't be committed

user.// infoPath: Path to your user info JSON file

claudeCode.// rawDataPath: Path to your Claude Code raw data directory
claudeCode.// pricingUrl: URL to fetch pricing data from
claudeCode.// pricingCacheTimeout: How long to cache pricing data in milliseconds (3600000 = 1 hour, 0 = no cache)

push.// endpoint: Your remote server API endpoint for usage data push
push.// apiToken: Bearer token for API authentication (keep this secret!)
push.// batchSize: Number of messages to push per batch (default: 1000)
push.// maxRetries: Maximum number of retry attempts for failed messages (default: 5)

database.// path: Path to SQLite database file (relative to project root)
